displayName: I Used 25 Spi-Roll Attacks In A Game!

name: 50_SpiRolls_Game
displayName: I Used 50 Spi-Roll Attacks In A Game!

name: Saved_Earth
displayName: I Am A True Rock 'N Roll Star!  I Saved the Earth!

name: 500_Asteroids_Game
displayName: I Destroyed 500 Asteroids In A Single Game!

name: 1000_Asteroids_Game
displayName: I Wrecked 1,000 Asteroids In A Single Game!

name: 2500_Asteroids_Game
displayName: I Obliterated 2,500 Asteroids In A Single Game!

name: Passing Rock 'N Roller
displayName: I have PASSED (with a C grade) in Rock 'N Roll!

name: Bravo Rock 'N Roller
displayName: B Stands for Brilliant!  I am Better than your "average" hero!

name: Awesome Rock 'N Roller
displayName: A Stands for Awesome, Amazing, and Astonishing!
description: I am an Ace at Rock 'N Roll!  Bring on 'dem rocks!

name: A Plus Super Star
displayName: How do you get more Awesome than a mere A?
description: Devastate the rocks and baddies in Rock 'N Roll! A+ baby!

name: 5 geos
displayName: 5 Beautiful Glimmering G.E.O.S. Gems Obtained!
description: 10% chance to save the Earth, let's go!

name: 10 geos
displayName: 10 G.E.O.S. Gems Ain't Cheesy.. or Easy!
description: 20% chance to save the Earth, let's go!

name: 25 geos
displayName: 25 G.E.O.S. Gems!  Holy Play Hooky To Save an Earth Day!
description: 50% chance!  Come on baby, don't fail me now!

name: 50k points
displayName: 50,000 points isn't bad, right?
description: ..Hey this game ain't easy, don't tease me!

name: 100k points
displayName: 100,000 points.  Piece of cake!
description: ..Hand over a cold beer to go this this cake now eh?

name: 200k points
displayName: 200,000 points, I could do this all day with my eyes closed!
description: Now watch and you might learn something... *CRASH!*

name: 500k points
displayName: Half a million points, just a walk in the park!
description: Hey, wake me up when something happens here, will ya?

name: million points
displayName: I'm a Millionaire!  ..Too bad it's only points and
description: a silly achievement on this crazy asteroid blasting game, hmm?

name: fail game
displayName: I just got a Fail game, err I mean Full game achievement!
description: Fail.. Full.. Potato, Patato  ..It's an achievement anyhow!

name: haxxor
displayName: haXX0r I am!  And proud of it mind you!
description: When it comes to saving the Earth, anything goes I say!

name: busy
displayName: I'm totally BAE.. "Busy As Ever"!!

name: bought mesa
displayName: I went all in and bought M.E.S.A protection !!

name: max rotate
displayName: I'm Soooo Dizzy!  Weeee!  Maximum Rotation Speed!!

name: max fire
displayName: Don't Mess With Me!  I'm a Bad Bad Man!

name: bought geos
displayName: Gotta mission to save the world.. Momma didn't raise no fool!

name: shot geos
displayName: I didn't mean to shoot the one chance I had at saving you..

name: survive kos
displayName: I Took them Triple Points of "K-OS" and I did NOT die!

name: vds eaten
displayName: That horrible vaporous red evil space blob ATE me!  OMG!

name: Kill First RSA
displayName: I got my first kill of something that isn't a Rock!
description: That thing.. I thought at first that it was trying to help me shoot the rocks.. then I realized I was in serious trouble!

name: Kill First Kamikaze
displayName: I killed that slimy green space snake before it "blowed me up"!
description: They just keep coming!  Those things will explode their acidic innards all over your shiny pretty space ship!

name: Kill First VDS
displayName: Holy Hell, where did that thing come from?  I killed it, I killed it!
description: They call it the VDS.. I call it my worst nightmare.  It's moving vaporous eyes are such horror!

name: earned life
displayName: Yahoo!  I just earned my first extra life!
description: Life out here is pretty grim, but I need all I can get to save my loved ones back on Earth!

name: 5 earned lives
displayName: Five Extra Ships baby!  That is NOT easy!  Yay me!
description: Five extra lives out here can be lost in mere seconds!  But I cannot give up!

name: first rhodium
displayName: I just found something real "purty" called Rhodium!
description: OMG, this stuff is worth a TON! .Now where's a McD's when you need one?!

name: first osmium
displayName: Dang, this is nice looking stuff, it's gotta be worth somethin'!
description: ..It might be pretty, but it don't make good toilet paper if you run out!  Just sayin'!

name: first gold
displayName: Gold looks so much shinier when you're out in space!
description: ..It must be the clean air out here making this gold so.. well gold.

name: first platinum
displayName: I just went Platinum baby!
description: ..And people always told me I couldn't sing!  This platinum proves them all wrong!

name: first iridium
displayName: I found something pretty decent called "iridium"!
description: When I first saw the iridium, I thought it was like a big chocolate kiss wrapped in shiny foil!

name: first cobalt
displayName: It's bluer than the Earth back home.
description: It's so blue, it makes me feel blue and miss home and my family!

name: first nickel
displayName: This is the biggest darned Nickel I've ever seen!
description: It's called nickel and worth only slightly more!

name: first titanium
displayName: Titanium! Wow! I'm rich! I'm rich!  This stuff gotta be worth millions!
description: ...It's worth less than that Nickel I found!  What?! ..This space hub is rippin' me off!

name: first iron
displayName: Oh darn, it's just a big chunk of Iron!  Whew!
description: ..I could have swore it was another darn asteroid and I was dead, but I heard the sound of the ship collector, woot! woot!

name: 250k
displayName: If I ever live through this, I might start mining asteroids more often!
description: $250,000 and all I can spend it on is this space ship!  Argh!

name: 500k
displayName: Half a million already!? Wow, this is sure easier than working fastfood service!
description: Half a million dollars and not a single pizza joint anywhere around!

name: millionaire
displayName: I'm a millionaire!  One million bucks I've earned  baby!!
description: I wish I could hire those Vaporous Death things to work for me instead of trying to kill me!

name: cannon ball
displayName: What is this CANNON doing out here in Space?!! Can I harvest that iron?
description: WoooHooooo!! Mommmmmmy!  Ohhhh Wowwwww!  Yeee Hawwww!

name: 10 rhodium
displayName: I like "purty" things!  I have now scooped up 10 Rhodiums!

name: 10 osmium
displayName: It's 10 Osmium I gathered, NOT "opium" as in drugs!  Geez!

name: 10 gold
displayName: With all this 10 gold I've collected.. I should be able to make me a nice "golden" stack of pancakes! Mmm..

name: 10 platinum
displayName: I just hit 10 times "Platinum" baby!  Look at me go!
description: ..With this last platinum, I just matched Garth Brooks first album from 1989, as that album also got 10 platinum too!  Woohoo!

name: 10 iridium
displayName: I can't get "rid" of "Iridium".. Now I've got TEN!

name: 10 cobalt
displayName: 10 X Cobalt, holy moly!  ..I'll have a blue "Cobalt" Christmas without you!
description: "You'll be dead and in fright with your Christmas of Plight.. But I'll have a blue, blue, blue, blue Cobalt Christmas!"

name: 10 nickel
displayName: Cha-Ching!  I just found my 10th Nickel out here in space!  Would be nice to find like a Quarter now!
description: "10 Nickels = 50 cents... Ugh. ..I'll never be able to buy that faster fire power at this rate!"

name: 10 titanium
displayName: 10 Titaniums now!  Sounds important!  (It's really not! Nickels are more valuable!)
description: They may not be worth much, but they would look nice hangin' on my Christmas tree

name: 10 iron
displayName: These little asteroid wanna-be things!  Argh, I got 10 of them now!
description: "The first iron cluster scared me as I hit it, now they are just annoying!"

name: resource collector
displayName: I've now collected 10 of each pretty, shiny, thing out here!
description: "It's nice to have a hobby that you enjoy when you're out in space killing monsters, shooting asteroids, and saving the world!"

name: resource hoarder
displayName: Resource Hoarder! ..20 of each!
description: "Mine!  All Mine!  Give me!  Mine!  Gimme, Giime!"

name: Legit
displayName: 100% Authentic Play!  No In-Game Cheats Activated!
description: "I may not be able to save the Earth, but nobody.. I mean NOBODY can ever say I saved humanity by cheating!"

name: sold 10 iron
displayName: I've now pawned 10 Iron balls!  A penny saved, a penny earned!
description: "They gave me that look when I pawned them dull dirty iron balls, but I held my head high!"

name: sold 10 rhodium
displayName: I done learned how to make 'dat money!  10 'dem Rhodiums sold now!
description: "It's really hard to part with something so purty, but I told it that it was me, not it when I left it"

name: beat level 1
displayName: OMG! I "KILT" every asteroid rock thing!  It's all gone!  Did I win?  I won huh?!?

name: beat level 5
displayName: Another wave of them rocks gone!  I feel like they will never end..
description: "5 waves of asteroids, so many close deaths..  But they are worth it!  Gotta save 'em"

name: beat level 10
displayName: That's the 10th wave of Asteroids blasted!  So many rocks!
description: "Each new wave presents more danger, more crumbles, more aliens.. Can I do it?"

name: beat level 15
displayName: 15 waves of Asteroids!  Holy hell in space!  Gotta keep pushin'!
description: "I swear these asteroids are trollin' me now.. is this a really bad dream?  Wake up self!  Wake up!"

name: shot on a cannon
displayName: I just got SHOT while flying that fast!! That's GOTTA be Auto-Aim!
description: "That thing, that thing is cheatin'!  How do I report that thing for hackin' with auto-aim!?"

name: boob cheater
displayName: I am an official "8008" by getting that exact score, 8008 uploaded to the leaderboards..

name: A55 Kicker
displayName: I just made a new friend in space!
description: This little A55 Kicker really kicks some ass!

name: mother sucker
displayName: Mother Sucker!  Wow.. I'm good at sucking this junk up!
description: I just learned how much fun it is to suck!  Yummy!

name: mother sucker 5
displayName: I'm getting soo good at sucking it all up baby!
description: Mmm, Mmm, Good.. Sucking it All up 5 times in a single game!  Sluurrrrp!

name: 5000_asteroids_game
displayName: I am a true Rock Breaker!
description: 5,000 Rocks Shattered.. and counting!

name: 10000_asteroids_game
displayName: 10K Rock RAWKER!
description: 10,000 Rocks you say?  ..I'm just getting started!

name: 2 million
displayName: Two Million Bones!
description: Millions come EASY when you're this damn good!

name: 8 seconds
displayName: OMG! I'm an 8 Second Man!
description: It's not easy lasting 8 seconds before exploding!

name: 30 seconds
displayName: I'm a 30 Second Dream Machine!
description: Holding it for 30 whole seconds takes mad skills!

name: 45 seconds
displayName: 45 Seconds Baby!  Get in Line!
description: You gotta get in line if you wanna play now!  I got massive lasting power here!

name: 90 seconds
displayName: 90 Seconds of Pure Perfection!
description: I'm just getting warmed up, are you ready for more?

name: 1 minute
displayName: 1 Minute of Frantic, Furious Action!
description: Who ain't got time for a minute man?!  Call on me whenever you got a minute to spare baby!

name: 2 minutes
displayName: 2 Minutes. Double the Fun!
description: I never thought I could last two minutes, but it went by too fast honey!

name: 3 minutes
displayName: 3 Whole Minutes Equals Triple Pleasure!
description: First I tried the 2 min action, now I'm loving the 3 min!

name: 4 minutes
displayName: 4 Fabulous Minutes is how I rock it!
description: I just gave it 4.. had so much fun that I wanna last a few more!

name: 5 minutes
displayName: 5 Minutes I Stayed Alive!  High Five!
description: Not anyone can last 5 minutes of that wild ride, but I lasted and held my pride!

name: Hard Rock 1000
displayName: I Scored 1,000+ in Hard Rock Mode!
description: Nothin' to be shy about, 1k points is worthy with only one life to live!

name: Hard Rock 2500
displayName: I just achieved 2,500 points in the hardest of hard times!
description: Hard Rock Mode: 2,500 Points!  Respect this!

name: Hard Rock 5000
displayName: 5,000 Points in Hard Rock mode!
description: Bow to me now.  Before I give you my 5k "pow"!

name: Hard Rock 10k
displayName: You Can't Top This!  TEN THOUSAND in Hard Rock Baby!
description: The skills required to get 10k is higher than what's needed to be in the NFL today!

name: 10 minutes
displayName: 10 Fast Paced, Furious Minutes!
description: Who wouldn't want someone who can last 10+ minutes at this kinda action!?

name: 15 minutes
displayName: 15 Minutes of Hard C.. err R..ock Action! I'm a Rock 'n Roll God!
description: I dare anyone to last this long!

name: 20 minutes
displayName: 20 Mind Blastin' Hard & Fast Minutes of This!?
description: You can't handle this!  ..You can't handle me baby!

name: 30 minutes
displayName: Half an Hour Of Pure Perfection!  RAWR!
description: I am truly One-In-A-Million!  I'm THAT damn good!

name: Hard Rock 25k
displayName: 25,000 Points in Hard Rock Madness!  Holy Smokes I'm Good!
description: Instincts of a cheetah, Blessed Skills of the Heavens!  That's Me Baby!

name: 1 dynamite
displayName: I collected my first Zaxpoleon Dynamite!

name: 5 dynamites
displayName: I've collected FIVE Zaxpoleon Dynamites!

name: 10 dynamites
displayName: I've collected TEN Zaxpoleon Dynamites!

name: 25 dynamites
displayName: I've collected TWENTY FIVE Zaxpoleon Dynamites!

name: blown a55
displayName: Oops! I done blown up my A55 Kicker!

name: blown self
displayName: ARGH! I blew myself!  What an explosion! Sheesh!

name: blown boss
displayName: Take that boss man!  I exploded on you!  Rawr!

name: blown worm
displayName: Kamikaze That Mr Space Worm!  Blown to HELL! Ha!

name: blown rsa
displayName: I blew that tentacle looking bastard to kingdom come!

name: blown rock
displayName: I just blasted my first asteroid with Zaxpoleon Dynamite! WhooHooo!
description: What a freakin' Blast!

name: first boss kill
displayName: It wasn't easy, but I ain't cheesy!
description: That lightning shootin' alien ship just got REKT by yours truly!

name: blown vds
displayName: That damn dynamite saved my life!  That red space blob is vaporized!

name: tutorial completed
displayName: I done learned a whole lot about well.. about rocks and shiny stuff!
description: Momma didn't raise no fool!

name: up your a55
displayName: I tried going "All In" with "Up Your A55" and I gotta say, It is Amazing!
description: "Up Yours Too Buddy!"  ;-)

name: monster rock destroyed
displayName: No obstacle is too big if you set your mind to beating it!
description: Monster Rock + Me = Pile of Dust!

name: protect the earth 50x multiplier
displayName: I didn't let good ol' earth take even a scratch baby!

name: az_spawned
displayName: I was getting lazy out in space, drinking a cold beer
description: And then this big ugly green rock thing did appear!

name: az_defeated
displayName: I kicked his ass!  Yeah!  The bigger they are, the harder they fall!
description: Oh My God did he leave a lot of parts in my way!
